titleStmt.title: The case of the Church of England, briefly and truly stated in the three first and fundamental principles of a Christian Church : I. The obligation of Christianity by divine right, II. The jurisdiction of the Church by divine right, III. The institution of episcopal superiority by divine right / by S.P.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Faithorne and John Kersey, and sold by Walter Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
